statements: UPDATE capital_gains SET sale_price = 1500.50 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE capital_gains SET investment_date = '2022-09-30', purchase_price = 1800.50, sale_price = 2200.00, capital_gain = (sale_price - purchase_price) WHERE user_id = 98765 AND investment_type = 'Stocks';
